name: Titanium.API
summary: The top-level API module, containing methods to output messages to the system log.

parameters.name: message
parameters.summary: Message to log. Accepts an array on iOS only.

parameters.summary: Message to log. Accepts an array on iOS only.

parameters.name: message
parameters.summary: Message to log. Accepts an array on iOS only.

parameters.name: level
parameters.summary: Log level. One of info, warn, error, debug and trace. If the value is not recognized, an info-level message prefixed with the value is logged.

parameters.name: message
parameters.summary: Message to log. Accepts an array on iOS only.

methods.name: timestamp
methods.summary: Logs messages with a timestamp severity-level, prefixed with a timestamp float number representing the number of seconds since January 1st, 2001.
